DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and tolerability of MK8266.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of MK8266 (8266-002)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Subject is male with essential hypertension (high blood pressure) Subject is in good general health (with the exception of hypertension) Subject is a nonsmoker Subject has a history of stroke, chronic seizure, or major neurological disease Subject has a functional disability that can interfere with rising from a seated position to the standing position Subject has any history of a bleeding or clotting disorder Subject has a history of cancer Subject is unable to refrain from or anticipates the use of any prescription or nonprescription medication Subject consumes excessive amounts of alcohol or caffeinated beverages daily
